Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Treatment for swelling that occurs in the eyelids." 
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alguna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	And it is an accumulation of thick humidity under and above the eyelid.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, the operation on them is considered appropriate when the swelling extends beyond the eyelid and spreads throughout the entire eye area; and its cause is light.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Make an incision along its width and then remove it from the entire area with ease as you extract it; then tie it up with a string and cut it off.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	But if you are unable to make an incision due to the lack of proper equipment and must penetrate the eyelid with small incisions gradually, it will have no effect.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the wound is large, then adjust it with stitches; and treat it until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is minor, you will not encounter any harm as its ointment restores the wound and promotes flesh growth.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the swelling descends towards the internal parts of the eyelid and affects its inner surface, then turn over the eyelid and tie up the swelling with a string; instead of making an incision, press it from all sides. If the eyelid becomes elongated due to the incision, it will have no effect.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	Under the incision, wash the hole with salty water and treat this place until it heals completely.
Capitol .x.	Chapter 10.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	On the treatment of swelling in the upper eyelid.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Swelling is often caused by an accumulation of material in the layers of the upper eyelid, and it mostly affects children, making their eyes heavy and forcing them to blink more frequently; they cannot bear the brightness of the sun due to this, as tears come to their eyes.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	You should keep them covered with something over their faces all the time and also while they sleep; and have moistened the lower eyelids of their eyes above the eyelashes, which is already swollen, and there is an evident threat of rupture in this eye; and that when you press the place with your fingers, you feel a lump inside.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	One method of operation is to have the patient lay their head on your knee, then cover them with a cloth and make a circle around it according to how much space you need; place this circle over the aforementioned area and press with all your fingers so that the lump rises in the middle of said circle; then make an incision into its center with a pointed spatula, but let the incision not be wider than what is made for flebotomy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Donc extratz aquella am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And make sure you don't push too far into the wound, for if the spatula touches the bone, it will irritate it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	If your artery doesn't appear at the beginning of the wound, but you find a small one easily accessible within it, proceed to extract that as we've explained before; then immerse some linen cloths in water and vinegar and place them over the area, pressing firmly with powdered substances.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And some should break salt and put it in the cavity of the wound, to ensure that nothing remains moist there.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then care for him until he is healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	If an abscess occurs in the area, treat it with soft poultices until it is healed.
Capitol .xi.	It seems that you are referencing a specific chapter or section of the text. Is there any further information or context you'd like to provide so I can assist you better?
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	On the methods of handling bones." 
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When the eyelids of the eyes are covered with new hair that has grown due to being shaved, this can cause various ailments such as excessive tears, softening of the eyelids, and a film over the eye, leading to the destruction of sight which is known as "tactinir." It can be treated in four ways: by cauterization with fire; by applying sharp medicine (as mentioned earlier); by performing an incision and suturing (atactini); or using a cannula, as I will explain later.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	You must place the patient's head on your lap; then, use your left hand to turn the eyelid of the eye inside out. If it does not turn easily, insert a needle into that part which is further from the starting point beneath the eyelid and push the needle with its thread upwards so that it emerges just below the edge of the eyelid where there are no hairs - as close to the hairs as possible. Pull the thread towards you above the eyelid and roll up the eyelid on this thread.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	Then make an incision inside the eyelid below the newly grown hairs using a sharp-edged spatula starting from the larger lacrimal towards the smaller one; after extracting the thread, place small pieces of cotton or cloth beneath the eyelid and then bandage over the eyelid in the shape of a myrtle leaf.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, be aware that the shape should conform to the amount of eyelid elevation, as this already varies among individuals; there are those whose eyelids must be cut back a great deal according to the amount by which the eyelid is softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	Then make an incision along the two lines you have marked, starting from the greater lachrymal bone towards the lesser one.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your fistula is near the natural hairline, it should be as wide as a king's ring.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	Then place the ointment in one of the two corners of the incision, thoroughly scrape it, and then sew the two lips together with fine thread or woolen yarn; remove any blood and make sure to press down on the superfluous skin above the eyebrows with some sticky material like wax if you wish, but this step is optional.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	Remove the stitches after three or four days, and treat it accordingly.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	If you wish, leave the wound open without stitches and treat it with drying and constricting agents; but for an elevated eyelid due to its sealing of the wound and adherence thereto, stitching is better - thus say the ancient surgeons.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	However, there should be concern for the patient's well-being during this procedure, and it is essential to ensure a good outcome while maintaining composure.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	There is another way to examine it, which is by observing the presence of shapes resembling myrtle leaves on the eyelids. Then, lift the eyelid with three separate but connected hooks in this manner:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	If the aforementioned hooks are not available or inadequate for this purpose, take a needle with thread and insert it into the center of the observed shape. Then, pass one end of the thread close to the larger lacrimal bone and the other near the smaller lacrimal bone. Ensure that both ends of the thread are of equal length when held between your fingers. Finally, use these threads to lift your hand upwards in a manner similar to what we've described.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then, approximate the two lips of the wound with a suture, ensuring it remains closed until healing is complete.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	However, if an abscess develops at the incision or opening site, it should be treated by applying a mixture of wax and its own exudate to promote healing.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	Sometimes, the eyelid may develop inverted eyelashes, requiring the procedure we previously discussed for incision. However, suturing is a more artificial approach in any case.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	Attaching the reeds should be done in this way:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	And it is you who convert the eyelid and divide its shape inside, as I have described; then, by skill, make two reeds or two thin canes whose length matches that of the eyelid and their width is less than that of the spatula.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have already divided at the ends of each part where you have threads.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Then add each one with precision on the superfluous parts of the child's eyelid, and tie the reeds together firmly at each part; leave it there for a few days because due to the constriction, its circulation will die and rot internally so that by itself, it falls off.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	But if it takes too long, then break them with tweezers; after that cure the wound until it is healed.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	Once it is solidified, the eyelid will be raised and the hairs will not stick out.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is how you make two reeds as described above:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.
Capitol .xii.	Sure, here is my translation of your provided text: 
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	When there is an elevation of prickly hair on the skin with a needle when the hair is hard.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When there are unnatural, hard, rough, and prickly hairs on the skin, the operation for it is that you take a fine needle and place it in the soft, thin membrane of the hair follicle, then you tie its ends together very finely.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	And let the length of these threads be in quantity equal to one palm's width.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	Then you make another fine thread beneath it shortly after, and knot its ends if you wish.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	Then have the patient put their head in your lap and be close to sunlight so that your work is clear, for it is a delicate and minute operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	Then introduce the needle into the root of the hair shaft with care and skill, make it penetrate through the eyelid swiftly until you extract that from the natural hair.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	Then pull the hair out from above and put it in a container, let there be one or two or three hairs at most.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	And then draw your hand over that area where the hair has been plucked out with depilatories on the eyelid, leaving the natural hair.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	But if depilatories are applied and the hair is not plucked out, you will apply depilatories to those areas with a cloth that you have prepared with it, until depilatory from the thorn is pulled.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And then wash it with the juice of the rue, for when you pluck out depilatories and the cloth, squeeze each one and leave them clenched for two or three days, until the hair regrows in its place and healthy flesh grows over it.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	And if the hair is shorter, you will attach a longer hair to the natural hairs and raise it with that one, or leave it until it grows enough to cover the space, then you can lift it.
Capitol .xiii.	It seems this marks the end of the treatise text. The "xiii" likely refers to chapter 13. Would you like me to summarize any part of it?
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	On the treatment of erysipelas that appears on the eyelid above." 
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	Here is the translation of your first source sentence: 
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	May the manner of the operation on him is that you divide that consolidation and separate his lips, and place on him in it that which is between those a piece of linen cloth, and bind those until they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And you must not use treatments that dry out the wound and hinder healing; for if you do this, it will return to its previous state of illness even more severely than before.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Apply to the wound a remedy that softens it, such as fenugreek, and mix it with water in which are soaked linseed and its seeds, or use an ointment called diacylum, which should be liquefied with any of the oils, and immerse the cloth in this mixture, treating the wound with it.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the aim of your treatment is that you make perforations with any tool that is not yet consolidated according to its original shape.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	And this operation that we have mentioned is nothing other than some rectification of the illness that fails to restore the form of the place as it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter 14.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	Of the treatment for inflammation of the eyelid which is done underneath.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This inflammation of the eyelid, which is truly called "alxacrati"; and it can be either naturally occurring or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	The accidental inflammation is caused by injury, or by incision, or due to cauterization, or other similar factors.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	The way to perform the operation is for you to take a needle with double thread and insert it into the flesh, passing from the left lachrymal [duct] to the right one, until the thread reaches both ends of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	Then stretch the flesh apart with your hands at the ends of the needle and sew it up with the needle, then make an incision with a wide spatula.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And so return the eyelid to its original shape as best you can; if not, take a needle and place it in the split, and with that, reform the eyelid, then make two incisions on the side of the lower eyelid.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	And if the ends of the two incisions, which you have made from the two corners of the incision meet, and an angle is formed where they join, such that when they come together a figure is created by them.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	E aquesta figura es letra grega: la landa.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	And then remove the flesh that is as wide as the patient's thumb below them, which is about the size of an eyelid.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the separated parts and sew them together with a thread of wool; after that, treat them with the softening medicines and poultices we have mentioned until they are healed.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	If you need to open it up there by incision, suture or cauterization, then make a flat incision on the skin of the eyelid as described before.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	Then separate the poultice between the two lips, as we have mentioned earlier.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	Finally, when it comes to the summary of the procedure for healing a wound, whether it is above or below, let it run its course during the operation, depending on how it was prepared and treated with various types of medications.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled practitioner always devises means to restore the figure as closely as possible to its original form or an approximation of it; this illness requires an operation and appropriate instruments, with the greatest attention to preparation.
Capitol .xv.	It seems that you have provided me with a chapter number in Roman numerals. Do you want me to translate this from another language as I did previously, or is there another task I can help you with?
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this consolidation occurs in many men, the eyelid may be tightly stuck to the white of the eye and is prevented from easily moving and performing its natural functions. In such a case, it is necessary for you to place one end of a needle under the eyelid and lift up on it or extend it with your finger.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	Then you carefully cut the adhesion with a fine spatula, which should not be too sharp to avoid any incisions during this operation and cause discomfort to the patient; remove the spatula while being careful not to scratch the eye with its sharpness.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	And your incision will allow the removal of that adhesion with ease, returning the eyelid to its natural shape and healing any remaining adhesions.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	Then you place the eye in salted water, which will be used to wash it; or alternatively, you can use a solution of zinc dissolved in water for this purpose.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	Then separate the eyelid from the eye with a warm compress; place on the eye wool infused in egg white and wait three days before using any consolidating agents to ensure it is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	Chapter 16.
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	Here is my translation of your provided text: 
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Here is my translation of the first source sentence: 
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	Both species do not begin but from the greater tear duct, which goes slowly covering the sight and prohibits both light and vision.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	The way of proceeding with the incision is that the patient should place their head in your lap and then open his eyes, raise the eyelid with your hand, and collect the claw with a small piece of cloth and extend it to the corners.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	Then take a needle and insert into it a horsehair or ox hair or cow's hair or something similar, or use strong thread, double the end of the needle slowly, then place it in the middle of the claw and push it with the needle, tie the claw with the thread; extend it to the corners, and remove the skin from the side of the claw that covers the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	And with this you prevent it from coming out again by covering it with hair on its rear side.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	Then you should make an incision at the root of the tear duct with a thin spatula or small scissors, and remove the flesh around the tear duct naturally so that after this procedure there is no continuous flow of tears.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And sometimes the claw is attached to the sole with wax or gall, as we have said, and then it should be extracted with a lion's spoon which has this shape:
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	Make sure that with the spoon you do not touch the cornea and that it does not break; also make sure that the pupil is perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then put a little bit of ground salt or powdered sinjar in the wound and leave it there for another day; then treat it with what is appropriate until it heals.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	And if the claw is not nervous and you cannot insert the needle into it or fix it with wax, then this kind of claw is cured with medicines; as stated before in the division section.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you want to cut it open, then make an incision in the patient's wound and take a fine lion spoon with a very sharp edge according to this shape:
am subtilitat.	with delicacy.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if you need to soften it and remove the hard bits from it, then drip some of your urine into the wound with plenty of sinjar powder or bird droppings or ground salt; leave the wound overnight.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	And then repeat your procedure on that spot until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	If you notice that the prominence of the tear duct is causing great harm, it should be suspended with a string; make an incision from one side to another, but do not extend the incision too far so as not to cut through the flow of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	Then, you should distill chief herb juice into the tear duct until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	The number XVII in Roman numerals represents 17, so this could indicate that this is chapter or section 17 of a larger work. Is there another sentence you would like me to translate?
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	On the incision of gangrene and what is born from flesh that has grown in the wound.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Some scars on wounds develop fleshy growths that cover the pupil or extend close to or onto the eyelids, and they press strongly against the surrounding areas of the eyelids.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	When operating on a patient, have them lay their head on your lap; then open the wound and gather all the fleshy growth with suitable strings, either with forceps or a basket; next, cut away the flesh at its base until it is all finished with scissors, taking care not to irritate the wound during this process.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Therefore, when you have completed the incision and removed all that flesh, fill the hole with crushed salt, or sprinkle powdered alum on it which is similar to corrosive medicines, and place over this wound raw egg whites until an abscess appears.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	And if any cause of inflammation remains and the blood is coagulated, and you fear an abscess may appear, then open the wound and treat that abscess with whatever substance causes it to disappear. Then repeat this operation on that same spot until it heals completely, and do likewise in similar flesh which grows within this type of wound.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, you must ensure that all treatment of the fresh wound is carried out by natural or accidental means, using iron instruments and never with your hands directly, unless you see that the limb can bear such an operation.
Capitol .xviii.	I am happy to assist you with translating more text if you wish. Can you please provide me with the specific lines from the treatise that you would like translated?
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	On the collection of pus in the wound." 
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, it is necessary at the beginning to consider whether the smell from which he suffers is strong and if there are no other diseases in him, then you should choose that one.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And tell the patient to place their head in your lap, and then suspend those veins with an ounce or two of [something], depending on your judgment. And let that ounce be made of fine linen, like so...
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	...or of two ounces greatly expanded into one body, in this manner:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	Then collect those veins with fine forces, carefully and gently, extracting the blood from time to time until you see that the veins have become relaxed from the smell and are rolling back in.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be careful not to touch the smell with your fingers' tips; and if it is noon, operate in front of a mirror, being very firm in your operation so that you do not cut anything but those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have finished, then you must distill over the smell a strong vitriol or spirit of salt so that with its sharpness it dissolves what is relaxed from the smell.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	But if this is not possible for you to collect at that time, then apply a plaster with whatever soothes his pain, and let him lie there for some days until the pain subsides and he is secure from a dangerous abscess.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	And then repeat this procedure on him in the same manner until he is healed.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	This is how the scissors should be arranged:" (followed by a description or illustration of the scissors' arrangement). 
Capitol .xix.	Here is my translation of the text you provided: 
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	De reduccio de arizati al nas." 
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat an abscess with a cautery or strong burning medicine as previously mentioned and it doesn't heal, the next step is to incise the abscess for maturation, extracting all the pus inside until the bone is visible.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And once the bone is exposed and there are signs of corruption or blackening, you should use an instrument like this one to remove it: (describe the shape and function of the surgical tool).
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	It is called an "aspre cap," made of iron with a rounded head, and the top is perforated with small holes either by filing or finely etched (as shown in the following illustration).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	Place the instrument over the corrupted bone area and then rotate it between your fingers; press down gradually until you feel that the corruption has been scraped away.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	Repeat this process several times, then restore the area with drying and astringent agents.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	If the wound has healed and good flesh has grown back; if the body is separated from the sinew and remains that way for 40 days without any renewal of discharge or abscess formation, then you can consider it cured.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	And if there is no other way, then the operation should not involve reducing the fracture to the shape of the nose, but rather follow this method: use either iron instruments or acute medicine [drugs] and, once the bone is exposed, make an incision following this pattern:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let the tip of the iron be triangular in shape with its shaft initially thinned down towards this end.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Place the instrument on the bone near the lacrimal [the tear duct]; extend your hand a little behind it and then rotate your hand with the blade such that it penetrates throughout the bone; this will make the patient feel as if something has come out from within, so take away your hand.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	After that, restore the wound with drying astringent medicines as advised.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	Once the flesh around the wound has hardened and the matter flowing outwards to all parts returns inside the nose, this will be less burdensome for the patient.
Capitol .xx.	It appears that you have provided another chapter or section indicator after the above text. Would you like me to translate it as well?
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On reducing the prominence of the skull.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the swelling is completely out and there is no damage or reduction in the excrement, it is time to release the patient, then follow them up, and then place bellows on their neck without scarifying and sucking for good suction; then apply a liniment made of acatra, aloe, enses, and sarcocolla over the swelling, and finally bind the poultice firmly with many cloths.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	The way to prepare the cloths is to take lion-skin sheets and fold each sheet four times over; make many of these folds.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	Then place those cloths one on top of the other according to the amount needed for the swelling.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Then secure over those with a hard cloth tightly; repeat the bellows with suction without scarifying, then remove the bellows and leave the swelling exposed day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	But if during this time the ligament softens, it is necessary to be very tight.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then remove the binding both day and night as we have said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if you see the swelling reduced, good; and if not, then repeat the poultice with the cloths and binding, as well as the bellows until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 21. 
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is a rupture in the choroid coat of the eye and it becomes prominent, pushing out the eyelids like a grape seed, distorting the shape of the pupil because of this, and you want to operate on it, proceed as follows: insert a needle into the root of the iris from below toward above, then put another needle with doubled thread into the part near the lacrimal gland, let that one penetrate while leaving the first needle where it is; now cut at the site of the double thread and remove the piece of choroid along the circuit of the needle, tie off that spot.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Remove the needle and apply wool dipped in egg white to it, allowing the thread to stick to the grape-like mass.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then treat the wound with something soothing until the infection is healed.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	In some cases, take a piece of cloth from any available source and use it to bind the wound tightly with a circular bandage; then puncture it carefully with a fine needle so that albuminous fluid can drain out, lower the bandage, and enter immediately.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	Then bind tightly until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Capitoli xxii.
De curacio de alconati.	Concerning the treatment of hernia.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This ailment known as hernia is not anything else but a rupture that has formed similar to descending water and it isn't the latter.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	The way to operate on it is as follows: make the patient lie down on an adapted and straight seat, then take his head with both hands from two sides and push that part inside so you see the rupture come back into place; then let it dry and not go down again, close off the light and the patient will see the causes just like this.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it won't go down again, then you should know that's water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	However, if you have not prepared the descent of the rupture as we've said before, then make the patient lie down between your hands and take a thin spatula and put it on the fat covering just below the continuity of the conjunctive tissue with the tough layer (at that place), while the rupture gets pushed outside.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Once it is pushed outside, then you drip in the orifice water mixed with either honey or water where you have previously boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And now treat any other causes until he is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	The numbering system used in medieval manuscripts often employed Roman numerals, so ".xxii." likely represents Chapter 22 of the treatise or text being referenced.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	On treating water descending from mountains." 
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	When it becomes necessary for you to make the patient cease between your hands over a pillow and cover their head tightly,
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	Then place your left hand close to the eyelid of their head, on the side from which the water flows – use your right hand if it is the right eye.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	Then take the sponge with your right hand if it is the left eye; or with your left hand if it is the right eye.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Then place the end of the sponge close to the cornea by the thickness of a hair in the white part of the eye near the lower eyelid, and then dip the sponge into the medicine and turn your hand thus.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	Then insert it into the white part of the eye and feel that the sponge has reached its destination due to your touch.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	Ensure that the length of the sponge's path to the margin is equal to the distance from the pupil to the end of the black part, which is the cornea of the eye; for you will see through this the pupil with the vision of the eye due to the clarity of the transparent cornea.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	Here is my translation of the provided text:
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	Then rest for a little while; if the water has descended, then you can place another cloth on it before any swelling occurs.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	And when it is dry and does not descend, then you can easily extract the pus, turn your hand around little by little, and then dissolve a small amount of clear rock salt in water and wash the wound with it; then place a lint bandage or wool cloth infused in rose oil and egg white over the wound to bind the wound.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	We and those who come after us should place over this wound with three layers of egg white.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if you do not open the pus inside the wound due to its hardness - as there are some men whose wounds are very hard -, then take the spatula called alberid, which has this shape:" (likely followed by an illustration or description of the tool's form)
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	And thus pierce that joint with it, do not leave your hand inside the hole, and make sure to clear a path for the pus to exit through.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	And then remove the pus as we have described above.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	And pay attention to the nature of this [condition], so that its true nature is understood and it does not worsen on either the right or left side.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	And [the wound] should be bandaged according to its position within three days.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	Then untie him from that dark place and bring him out into the fresh air, show him some things (or 'some light'), and then re-bandage him within seven days.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	It is not necessary to do this during the hours of treatment or immediately after an infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	Later, ensure that you keep this away from water to prevent it from becoming easily and excessively wet.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	However, if an acute abscess occurs, it is necessary to open the boil before the seventh day and treat it with a medication suitable for abscesses.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	Then you should cover their eyes and place a cloth over the affected area for some days, keeping them in that dark place.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	Then he should be moved to a larger space and shown various things (or 'given new sights').
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And know that there is no excuse for the disciple to have any visual impairment when it comes to the operation, therefore you must be bold in your actions.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	And we have encountered some of those who practice the art of extraction, and one among them said that they made a fire in the Ayrac while ensuring not to damage it with their tool, from which water was drawn.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	However, I have not witnessed anyone in our land who has perfected this technique, nor is it mentioned in any of the ancient texts; thus, it could be considered a new method.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	And these are the ways to distinguish the species of extraction, ensuring that those who are unaware of them can identify them:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	Whether they are made of horn or iron, and their ends are shaped with this triangular precision, the sharp end should be like this as well.

De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	Regarding the treatment of nasal flesh wounds:
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When in the nose different tissues are born and adjusted, of which some cause is similar to a multi-legged scorpion or a many-footed octopus; this disease is called 'polypus' as it resembles that creature.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And from it is cancerous flesh, ravaged, of dark color; and there is also the lion-like flesh which has a reddish hue.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Therefore, in the case where this is a benign and non-cancerous lion's flesh, you must make the patient lie between your two hands and expose him to sunlight, open his nostrils wide, and pick at these tissues with your fingernails.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	Then extract that which has separated itself from the rest, and divide what you have obtained with a sharp thin spatula; in doing so ensure to remove any causes of disease remaining there as far as possible, removing them with one of your fine instruments until nothing remains.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	But if it should happen to fill with blood or there is an evil discharge of pus, you must apply that which is necessary; and if this be one of the malignant pustules, then drain off and cauterize them before any blood is shed and ensure the cavities are completely emptied.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	And then pour into the nose a mixture of vinegar and water or wine.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	If the nose is opened and you notice moisture proceeding from it into the palate, then you know it is healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	But if the moisture does not penetrate as it should, you understand that inside are flesh and puss covering the bones of the nose which have not yet been cut.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Therefore, you must intervene with the tool of your choice which has some thickness to it and insert into the nose as many almonds as possible, placing between each almond an amount equal to that of your finger or less, and ensure the patient does not move while inserting one end of the tool into the nose gently.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And when this is done, let the doctor expel his own nasal mucus into the patient's nose so that it reaches their nasal cavity, and be expelled from the patient's mouth, for children in schools often mimic such gestures, and it is a simple action to perform.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then place both ends of the tool outside of the nose, one end above it and another within it, and administer pieces of meat to cover the almonds on the rod, doing this until you know that the flesh is at the level of the almonds.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Then extract the bile and apply a cloth with blood-drawing properties to the nose for three days or more until the ointment corrodes all that is rotten in the flesh.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	Then at the end of this treatment, insert into the nose a leaden tube for several days until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	But if this explanation of treatment does not suffice, use the following one instead.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	And this is the form of the purging instrument, a distiller of oils and medicines into the nose:" 
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	And make this with silver or bronze, which should be similar to a small open lamp, like a small bowl, and the handle accordingly.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	And if you wish, make a closed cannula like a reed, and the cannula of the purging instrument should be flat, uncovered; with its handle at the back, which you can hold when heating the oil or water that you want to mix with the extracts.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	These purging remedies are useful: a recipe of castor oil, white hellebore, ginger, saffron powder, long pepper, squill, and the seeds of fennel per ounce. Mix them with juice from purslane and mallow, make these into pills, and soak one pill in warm water; then place it up the nose of the patient lying face down.
Capitol .xxv.	It seems that this is likely the number or name of the chapter, as it appears to be separated from the previous text. Could you provide some additional context for me to translate accurately?
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	Thistles grow at the ends of the nose." 
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu." 
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And so it is necessary that you immerse him at the beginning of his illness and inherit all that he possesses.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	Then place over the area either a cautery or a caustic medicine, which should be applied to the affected site.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	If the swelling has lasted for some time and is large, hard, black in color, and with little feeling, then do not touch it with iron as it is a severe abscess; many times when one opens this kind of abscess, great harm comes to him on whom it had developed.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is soft to the touch and not dark in color, and you consider that its opening is possible, then evacuate the patient and open the abscess without fear; treat the site with something that dries it out and restricts it so that it may heal.
Capitol .xxvi.	It appears you want me to translate another section of the text, which is titled "Chapter 26". Please provide this chapter's content for translation.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	Regarding the suturing of the nose, lips, or ear when their continuity has been interrupted by trauma or something similar.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Know that when an interruption of continuity occurs in one of these cartilaginous areas, you will rarely perform this operation except on some men.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partita de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.
