De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the extraction of stones from females." 
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	Moreover, if stone is found in any of these (organs), then it will be difficult to cure him and the treatment is forbidden by various methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of them is that a woman who has very little pubic hair is likely to be a virgin.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second (reason) is that you will not find a truly virtuous woman who reveals herself to the doctor when she is chaste, or among women who have husbands.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you will not find a woman who knows this medical practice well, especially regarding operations with the hands.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the place of incision over a stone in women is far from the location of the stone, because due to fear, those who have to perform the procedure hesitate, and in such cases, there is danger.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if you must proceed with this (operation), then know that you should take an experienced female doctor who is rarely found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you are deprived of that (i.e., an experienced female doctor), then look for a male physician who is gentle and delicate, or present a female matron well-versed in women's matters, or a woman who has some skill in this practice.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Therefore, perform this examination and instruct them to do everything you ask of them regarding the investigation at the beginning; the reason is that it must be checked if the woman is a virgin, so put your finger into their anus and feel for the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	If you find it, remove it with your finger, then instruct them to push on it.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if she is not a virgin, command the midwife to insert her finger into the patient's vagina and feel for the stone, as they place their left hand on the bladder and press it firmly.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	If you find it, then they must gradually extract it from the opening of the bladder to below with all their strength until they reach the root of the hip.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	Then push on that area at the midpoint of the vagina below the root of the hip wherever it is stuck and feel for the stone in that region; their finger must not be withdrawn from the stone as you remove it from them.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And if the incision is small at first, then insert the rasp into that incision and feel for the stone; adjust the incision according to how much you know the stone will be removed.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	Certainly! Here is my translation of the provided text into English: 
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore, you should know which spices are used for this, depending on what you want to achieve.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you wish to induce bleeding, place powdered vitriol on the area and leave it for an hour until the blood is drawn out, then return to your operation once the stone is forgotten.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	Make sure you have prepared one of the instruments that I mentioned for extracting stones from men, so that you are assisted by these during your operation.

And if you want to induce bleeding and know that the blood expulsion is from an incised artery, then place powder on the area and bind it with cloth strips in a loose manner; do not repeat this process, instead leave the stone alone and don't extract it, for surely the patient will die soon.
E aprop cura la plagua.	Then treat the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	So once the sharpness of the blood has subsided after some days, and the area has swollen, then return to your operation once again when the stone is forgotten.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter 62.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	De seccio sobre ernia acoza.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia ayguoza is nothing other than the accumulation of moisture in the white cephalic part which lies below the genitals containing the testicles, and it is called 'cephalic'.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	In some cases, it occurs in the proper fatty tissue which nature has prepared for them when they were still just a testicle; and this is the genital cord between the white cephalic part we mentioned earlier, and this is nothing but varicose veins.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	The generation of this hernia occurs due to the weakness that affects the genitals, as this matter infiltrates them; and sometimes it happens due to a blow received on the genitals.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	This moisture has different coloured spots; its colour being either like that of the patient or tending towards yellow or blood-coloured, or rust-coloured, or else it is black and filthy, or it is clear white fluid, which is most common.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	The signs by which one can know that this is an accumulation of water are as follows: if it is in the white cephalic part we mentioned before, then the abscess is round and slightly elongated like a testicle, with the genitals appearing because moisture surrounds them entirely.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	Sure! Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	Underneath the navel and above the pubic bone is where you should measure with your fingers.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	When you want to understand the colour of the moisture, look at the colour of the discharge from the pustule which precedes it; and based on what is seen in the traces left behind by this, judge accordingly about what lies within.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Therefore, when we come to the treatment of it with iron, we must command the patient to undergo bloodletting if this is possible; and fill their body with wine.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	Then have him lay face down on some sort of slightly raised platform, and place a few pieces of cloth underneath him.

Then sit yourself on the patient's left side and have your assistant stand to their right; they should extend their hand towards either side of them at navel level, down towards where the abdomen starts.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	Then take a thin spatula and use it to slice through the navel, dividing its length from end to end, right along the pubic bone.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent. Certainly, let's continue translating the medieval medical treatise: 
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	And then pierce the sac filled with water using a wide perforation tool, and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	And then separate the two labia of the incision with hooks, stretch the sac towards its edges; do not touch the chain that covers the genital region, and cut the sac in such a way that you can.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	Cut it either entirely or in pieces, especially its thin side, for if you do not examine the incision meticulously, there is no guarantee that water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if the wound extends beyond its chain during your operation, once you have finished cutting into the sac, return it inside again and adjust the two labia of the genital region's chain with sutures; then treat this wound as any other until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if the wound becomes corrupted by another illness, you must tie the vessels that are above the scrotum and remove the testicle; then treat it as mentioned before.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay. E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	Then extend the probe with hooks, scrape it with hooks, and scrape it with a delicate ignited cautery; cut into it as much as you can to eradicate everything; be careful that the bone is not touched by fire.

Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	If abscess arises during the time of sectioning or cauterization, or there is bleeding, you must treat any complications that arise as appropriate with the healing methods mentioned above.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	If the patient is timid and cannot bear a second operation due to its severity, then administer perforation as I have recommended; this is when it has been verified by what we have said about the signs that the hernia contains water.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Ensure that the patient is laid down on a slightly elevated couch; then pierce the abscess in its lowest part with a flat scalpel, and make the incision according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And let the incision be wide enough so that all the water can flow out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	Then place yourself over the spot where you cut them and let it be, leaving that area alone so that any remaining water can flow out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then care for the wound until the inflammation is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is any opposition to the flow of water at this time, you must perforate it: this should be done only because the white membrane around the opening of the wound acts as an obstacle and hinders the release of water; therefore, insert into the wound a needle or other instrument that serves to extract water from hydropic swellings, which is already known for its use in such cases; or place a small tube at the incision site.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	Know that the water may return and persist for around six months or so; if it does, then once again you must perforate according to this same manner, as the patient will suffer these symptoms daily.

De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	Certainly, this appears to be the title of chapter 63: "On the Incision for a Fleshy Hernia and its Treatment." Shall I translate any further text from this chapter?
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that during this operation on the hernia, there is fear of harm and potential danger in its major stages, therefore, it seems to me better to dismiss the patient for their own safety.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am just recalling the operation on that particular individual and the specific types of abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	So I say that abscesses arise in the parts of the body where veins are composed and this occurs due to multiple causes: either due to acute excess of moisture which infiltrates the veins, or because of a blow.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the colour of the abscess is related to the colour of the body part, it does not bring pain, and this is a serious abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And very rarely is the abscess ossified, its colour is dark, and there is no sensation in it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And in some cases it happens due to the blocking of arteries and swelling of those which have already been perceived before, or because of swelling of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	What is more, that which happens due to the swelling of arteries is known by the dispersal of the abscess when you press it with your fingers as I say; and it should not be touched.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	May he who is affected by venous inflammation not be dispersed from him for any reason, you must apply compression to the said areas.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that an incision can be made on this specific area and over the other tissues; where you cut the cords of the genitals, then open them at their joints, extract what's inside the white testicle, free the vessels' suspenders, tie them up, and make an incision in the suspender so as to remove it from any part of the testicle.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore, if the testicle has already become solidified with those tissues, you must extract the testicle and make an incision in it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is any adhesion between the testicle and its causes or what's in between the vessels, you must free all of this adhesion and make a circular incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is a birth of flesh in the place where the adhesion behind it is located, you must make an incision in all that belongs to it and extract the testicle as we have said before.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Once your operation is complete, fill the wound with wool infused in rose oil and wine; then treat it with another cure until it heals.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter 64.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	Regarding the cure of an inguinal hernia. 
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	Vit is an abscess encased by some wrapping resembling a sprout with softening of the testicles, and it makes strenuous exercise and walking difficult for the patient.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in treating this illness, it is done out of fear which precedes the recollection [of what could happen].
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, let us call it an operation in this second case as we did previously.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	We should place the patient on an elevated platform; then apply the testicular supporter below; and take the cord of the penis with your fingers or pincers attached to the glans; have those other assistants I mentioned ready, and stretch these vigorously.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	Then cut across the vessels with a thin sharp spatula where the veins are visible.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	Then remove all that we have mentioned in extracting the sinews which are found on the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	Insert a needle with a double eye into those places and secure it at the first place where you find pus, then do so again towards its rear.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	And then cut into them at the mid-point with a straight incision according to the length of the body, and extract that which is accumulated from the foul and corrupted humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	Then treat the plague with other remedies where you want the wound to be healed, and let it reach vessels that nourish one of two geneses, for this is not harmful.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if there is damage to all the vessels, then it should be assumed that the testicles must be removed or that the testicles must be cut off with the vessels, so that they are deprived of all nourishment due to the incision of the vessels, and that they shrivel up, or so that they do not benefit from them.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter 65.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to an incision that begins in the diaphragm extended over the abdomen from the edges of the navel, because as a result of this rupture some of the intestines come out.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	This rupture is either of the diaphragm or its excision, and it occurs in these two species due to various causes: by percussion, jumping, shouting, raising something heavy, or similar.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	Here is the translation of the first source sentence: 
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes the intestine or hernia is forgotten and left outside, this condition is called intestinal inguinal hernia.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes air is trapped in the abdomen, or a part of the intestine gets twisted and becomes imprisoned there, which causes great harm to the patient, and often leads to severe painful discomfort especially when it's pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	In treating the varieties of this illness with iron tools one must be careful because they should avoid any contact with blood.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	The way to operate on this condition is that you command the patient to push the intestine back with their hand into its cavity if they can do it themselves, then have them lay on their back and raise their legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Then tie the end of the cord that is attached to the scrotum towards its upper parts, and cut the cord of the testicles entirely along their length; then place two hooks into the edges of the incision according to what you need in order to open this incision with those.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if, according to the extent of the incision it is possible that part of the intestine was forgotten.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then remove that layer of skin which is below the scrotum, ensuring that the white hard membrane on each side is exposed.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then insert your finger into what contains the testicle, which is between the white membrane, located below the penis, and the second membrane, and release any adhesions found in the area behind the penis.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then grab the scrotum with your hand and move it to the outside areas, stretching the white membrane with your left hand, and lift the penis up towards the incision area; instruct the assistant to pull on the penis upwards while you fully dissolve the adhesion located behind.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	Check with your fingers that there is no cause for the hernia to be wrapped in the hard white membrane.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	If you find any cause for concern during this examination, then push it back into the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	Then take a needle with a thick wire made of six wires, insert it from behind the second membrane which is below the scrotum and above the incision; carefully separate the four protruding ends of the wire so that they are apart, then bend them to form a cross-like figure; secure this firmly to the membrane we mentioned earlier, located beneath the scrotum, on both sides.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then you wrap the ends of the bile ducts and tie them firmly with a strong ligature, ensuring that none of the vessels can transmit any cause for abscess formation here.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	Place another ligature over the first one, leaving a distance of at least three fingers between them; leave this gap between the two ligatures as wide as the circumference of the testicles, and incise all that remains according to its curvature, then remove the testicle.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	Then incise in the part below the scrotum, making an incision through which blood and pus can flow as we have described before.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	Apply a cloth soaked in oil to the wound; apply the ligature we have described (and sometimes the white cicatrix is cauterized, which we mentioned just after the incision of the temple due to profuse bleeding, as this often occurs) and leave the ligature until it falls off by itself.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the patient's condition is serious, then a cold compress should be applied, and it should be left in place until it falls off as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	Then treat the plague with another plague cure until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter 66. (or Chapter LXVI, depending on the numbering system used).
De hernia ventosa.	On a hernia that sucks in air or gases.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	I have not seen anyone be treated for this type of hernia with iron (a reference to cauterization).
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	They said that this hernia occurs in the same way as we have described for the type of hernia I showed you earlier; which is that you cut the vessels just above the section where it was easily accessible and then dry up the abscess around it with something that hardens and shrinks it, ensuring the vessels are not damaged.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	Treat the plague as we have mentioned above until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 67. (or Chapter LXVII).
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	On the rupture that occurs in the groin.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Some ruptures occur in the groin area as we have mentioned earlier, and they protrude from their location.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	They do not assign any cause of hernias to the genitals; if they do, it is a minor one; and it comes back again in all cases.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment of him is with a cautery as described in the preceding account.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured with an iron according to this method: have the patient lie on their back between two servants' hands, then dry out the place of the abscess rupture by cutting across its width for a length of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	Then tighten the white scarf that is under the chain until it is uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	Take the ray (a type of medicinal herb) and place it over the protruding part of the scarf, pressing it against the patient's belly.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	Then stitch the two protruding parts over the end of the herb onto the scarf, sewing one to the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	Finally, pull out the end of the herb, but do not fully remove it from the scarf, and do not let go of the intestine, or any other similar action that I may have to know in the treatment of an intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	Then treat that one with the method for wounds: when you cut into the pus, clean it and restore the wound until it is healed; because the scarf is tight and does not adjust to the rupture's prominence.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cauterization is better in this place because it is closer to recovery.

De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On softening the cord of the testicles." 
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquella son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Here is the translation of the provided text:
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, since at the beginning there is an excess of softened cord, secure it with three or four stitches and a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	Then incise between the stitches, and take care of the other wounds until they are healed and the pus has drained.
Capitol .lxix.	The number "69" in English would be a good translation for this line, as it represents a chapter or section marker in a medieval text.
De castracio.	This translates to "On Castration." It likely refers to a chapter or section heading discussing the procedure of castration, which was a common medical practice in medieval times for various reasons, including religious rituals, treatment of certain diseases, or as a punishment.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	You should be aware that castration is forbidden in our law, but due to the reason it has been mentioned to me and written about in this book; its remembrance is not necessary except for two manners, one of which is so that it might fall within the knowledge of a physician when they are asked about it, as they must know how to treat someone who undergoes such a procedure. The other manner is that we sometimes have had to castrate other animals for our own convenience with regards to those creatures, like horses, goats, pigs, and similar beasts.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	Certainly! Here is my translation of the given text: 
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	Here is my translation of the text: 
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	Then take those with your hand before they are dissolved or appear beneath the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	For emasculation done through a fissure or incision, it is necessary to hold the animal and squeeze its testicular cord with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	Then tie the suspension (ligament) and make an incision on each side, so that two processes proceed.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	Then incise those (testicular cords) as much as you have exposed.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	Do not leave any cause over the navel except for the subtle one which is over the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of emasculation is better when done by traction because strong traction leaves almost no cause (of the testes) for the animal to seek warmth.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	Then treat the wound until it is healed.

De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men occurs in two ways: the first is when there is a gap in the area of the testicles, in that space between both testicles where female genitals are formed, along with hair.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes from that place urine flows which is in the area of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	However, in females, there is one specific characteristic: the vagina of a woman on the pubic mound resembles two testicles of a man slightly smaller and located outside like the foreskin of a male and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the treatment is of three types: for two cases in men and one case in women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	It is necessary to insert those tight pieces of flesh until the swelling subsides, and then you should treat those with the same cure as other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	In the second type of men where urine flows from the area of the testicles, there is neither a cure nor an operation for it.
Capitol .xxi.	This appears to be a chapter or section title, labeled as Chapter 21 in Roman numerals. Is there another text portion you would like me to translate?
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of pimples and flesh protruding due to causes related to women." 
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum in les homes e perve entro al coito.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not make a final incision, especially in the area of the navel, so that there is no bleeding.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then take care of those wounds with appropriate treatment until they heal properly.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	New flesh that grows in the womb of a mother is called an embryo, and it is formed from the parts outside like a tail (and thus I call this early stage "tailed disease"); therefore, we must cut it like a wart and treat it until it heals.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter 72: Treating Wounds with Cautery (continued)
De curacio de alratica.	On the treatment of fractures.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	A fracture is when a woman's bone is not perforated or has a small break.
E es o natural o accidental.	It can be either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	An accidental fracture is caused by an illness that has occurred beforehand, or it can be due to weak bones, a subtle twist, or something heavy pressing on the bone.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	Such a fracture can occur in the head of the fetus, its sides, upper part, or lower part. It is important to prohibit any cutting, pressing, or birthing attempts and also avoid menstrual blood during this time.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if an obstruction is due to a thin, delicate hernia that is near the two lips, then you cut it open and rupture it.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And if you place plasters on the two lips, then put your mentioned index fingers of both hands above them.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And let the woman be on her back with her thighs extended; then stretch out the two lips forcefully so that this thin hernia is ruptured and the obstruction opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Then take wool, dip it in oil, and place it on the site; have a man come daily so that the incision site does not become hardened.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the hernia is large and thick, be aware that you must incise it with a broad scalpel or myrtle leaf.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to flesh, then suspend it with a hook, and incise it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And if you have the medicines that stop bleeding without a bite, such as achillea, and dragon's blood, and onions, mixed with egg white.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And then administer a wide lead cannula so that the plaque is not easily solidified.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	Keep it there for a few days and administer an ointment made from dry herbs.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then it shall be cured by another treatment of consolidation before complete healing.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And sometimes there occur in the mother's womb other fleshly growths; then it is necessary to cut according to this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if this is for the excision of large abscesses, then care must be taken to avoid any iron instruments on the mother.
Capitol .lxxiii.	It seems that you have provided me with an additional piece of text from this medieval medical treatise, possibly indicating a new chapter or section. Would you like me to continue translating? Please provide the full text for accuracy.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the treatment of hemorrhoids, tails, and red bumps that occur in women's vaginas.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are the protrusion of small veins from within, where a continuous flow of blood occurs; and when hemorrhoids are old and become hard.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And now I have mentioned the different types of such cases and their signs in this division; likewise, those which receive a cure and those that do not.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore, I say that hemorrhoids and tumors when present in the mother's womb but not apparent to our senses, should not be treated with iron instruments.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those that are located in the mother's birth canal and which we can feel, these are the ones that can be cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And when you put the woman in a warm bath and then stretch out her hernia with forceps or a rough cloth, incise these with a lancet.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	Then sprinkle over it from one of the powders that are produced by incising without the use of teeth substances such as acacia and others similar to these.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then immerse her feet for an hour and afterward place the hernia in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the bleeding continues, then apply to it a poultice of boiled pomegranate rinds, walnut shells and similar substances.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take barley flour and mix it with honey, sour wine, and make a plaster with this, applying it to the patient's back.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	If the blood is cut off, it's good; if not, make it adhere with two cupping glasses and scarify the breasts.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then take wool and immerse it in coriander juice, or in white nettle juice with vinegar, apply this to the wound, and treat the area with ointment until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But remember, the one with a harsh gaze, make sure you cut into him what appears from that second according to what I have said in this treatise.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And once it is healed.

De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Regarding piercing or accidental incision of the hymen." 
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Here is my translation of the first source sentence: 
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already spoken about these illnesses and their types, as well as the symptoms of each one, and their treatments in this section.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	Now, I will explain about the abscess that occurs in the breast, which is one of the types of abscesses that can be cured, and if you wish to know how it is operated upon with an iron instrument.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	So when you consider that the pain of the abscess in its early stage is sharp with a percussion feeling and phlegm, along with fever, and if it appears red and feels hard to the touch, then do not attempt to pierce it, but treat it with what aids maturation until the severity of these symptoms ceases.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then you should have the woman sit on a chair that has two stools; recline her back onto one of them and adjust her feet to the lower part below the stomach area, with her thighs spread apart, place her arms under her buttocks, and tie each [arm] securely with suitable bindings.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Then the midwife will approach from the right side and handle the instrument with which to open the orifice of the breast, the shape of which shall be described in the following steps.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And now, when you want to administer this instrument, make sure the tip of it reaches the mother's womb, and ensure that what enters her womb from the instrument is not larger than the opening itself; do not harm the patient.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	If the instrument is larger than the mother's opening, then you must apply powders to the surface of her womb so that it prevents any entry into the womb.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And make sure to rotate the string that runs through the instrument from the side, and let the minister hold the instrument while turning the string until the opening of the womb is exposed.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	Once the opening appears, and it is touched by hand and found to be warm and moist, then you must dry that area with a laterally curved spatula.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the blood is evacuated, you must place on the wound a sponge soaked in rose oil or green oil that has some astringent properties; apply the caustic alum to the edge of her womb.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	Take out the mother and place her on clean linen soaked in water infused with boiled mallows.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then it will be cured in about two days with an ointment that is suitable for this, so that it may heal.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	Sometimes the mother and the child are washed with a mixture of honey and water until it crystallizes; then boiled root of lily or coltsfoot is added to the water before returning it back into the ointment.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the child is sick within the mother's womb, then it is necessary that you should be prohibited from curing him with iron; rather cure him with what we have said in this section.

A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	Here is how midwives should treat non-viable fetuses.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	It is necessary for midwives to understand the signs of a normal delivery from the very beginning. When you see that the woman is squeezing her thighs together and breathing heavily during childbirth, it indicates that she is close to delivering a baby in a natural position with its head down. And if the baby's feet come out first or suspended by the umbilical cord.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Therefore, when you see these signs, make sure the patient's belly is compressed so that the embryo descends lightly, for when it comes upon its head, it receives the second stage of labor, and is rid of those superfluities with a good delivery.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu i, o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	May that person be deemed unnatural and unviable if the embryo is seen to exit through their feet with the body coming out in front of its head or the patient's legs first, or only one arm or leg comes out, or if the baby's head and an arm or a leg come together, or the belly turns hard towards its back, resembling these unviable shapes.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	It is necessary for the midwife to be wise and subtle in all these matters, and she must guard against errors and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And I am illustrating the whole figure of these matters, revealing what is implied by them, and that which should be known about each.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the child is seen to exit through its head via natural birth and that causes distress in the woman during a difficult delivery, you may notice her virtue has become weak; make an incision or have other women hold her, then apply warm oils with fenugreek paste.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then introduce the meter into their small mouth and cut it with a second knife or scrape out whatever is inside of moisture.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	Press on the woman's belly until the fetus descends.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	However, if it does not descend, then the woman should be anointed with an ointment of horsehair and fenugreek seeds.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	Then command her to be compressed and make her sneeze with vinegar; close her mouth and nose for an hour, as the fetus will soon be expelled.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if both the fetus's arms are trapped at the beginning, then you should reduce them with small forceps gradually.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	However, if it does not obey the traction, then place the woman on a stool and raise her legs, then push the stool towards the ground; the woman must be held so she doesn't fall due to the impact.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the arms are not turned back inside and the fetus dies, then cut them open and extract its remains or tie its body to her hand with cloth and pull it out equally, as it will be difficult.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the patient is placed on their feet, then you must push them forward slightly, and then turn him into a sitting position, and afterward kneel him, and next take one of his legs and extend it little by little.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	When they are examined between the thighs (groin area), you instruct them to strain and force a cough, for it may cause a hernia if God wills it so.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	If it is not herniated due to the action we have described, then you return him little by little to his original position until he regains his usual figure, as this will be easier for a light examination.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if all the above is forbidden or not possible, then take a mixture of alum and dissolved gum arabic, grind it in a mortar with good force, and apply this paste to the woman's groin, at the lowest part of his stomach.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	Then make her cease this (action or procedure) in cold water so that she achieves the hypochondria (region of the upper abdomen).
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when you see that the affected parts of him are hardened, then have him undergo fumigation with myrtle and place her on top of it.

De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you treat the dead fetus with what we have discussed in the medical division and there is no other way out, and you are forced to use manual operation, it is necessary to consider whether the woman has a healthy constitution and is not suffering from any conditions that could lead to complications during the procedure.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then ensure that the woman is positioned lying on her back with her head tilted downwards and her thighs elevated.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The assistant should hold one of the woman's legs or have it tied down to prevent her body from moving excessively during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	Then, moisten the mother's mouth with moist oils and a mucilage made from marshmallow root, fenugreek, and flax seeds.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	The midwife should coat her hand with those oils and mucilage, carefully insert her hand into the mother's body, and try to locate where the fetus's claws are embedded.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	In such cases: consider whether the fetus is positioned in a way that it can be extracted by pulling from its head; if so, you should grasp its claws and pull from its heels, neck, mouth, palate, below the beard, underarm area, or the hollows of its chest, or hypochondrium.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.: But if the descent is upon their feet, then it will be in the heel, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.: You must have your thumb with your right hand and place the bend of your body in that space which is between the fingers of the left hand, and easily insert your hand and place your thumb in any of those places we mentioned earlier to reach the deep cause.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.: Then place and hold in the patient's position another thumb, or a third if necessary, to ensure equal traction, and not just extension according to its straightness alone.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.: It should be held at every point, so that their excretion is alleviated in this way as it is done for the extraction of teeth.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut. Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	So if the part is overlooked, the hooks will be changed to where it's deeper; do this until all of it has been removed.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if one hand is further forward than the other and it's not possible to bring it into line by pulling it, then you must wrap a cloth around it; now remove that hand until all of it has been taken out, cutting through at either the wrist or the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do likewise to the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest. E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly, if the defect is of a large head due to nature: then it is necessary to incise that with tongs or take hold of it with hooks as we have said; and then extract the bones using forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is prominent and shortened, you must cut the foreskin, then split it open so that the moisture within the foot can be drained.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not difficult or bulky, you may proceed to incise the head as soon as you can.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	If there is an abscess on the belly or if it has dropsy, then you must pierce that until all moisture within it is released.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the defect is on its feet, then its attraction is slight and its direction towards the mother's mouth is also slight.

But if it is shortened at the belly and feet, you must extract that with cloth which you have wrapped around your hand, and split open the belly and feet to release what is within.

De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Regarding the shapes of the instruments which are necessary for extracting the fetus...
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	...The shape of the forceps with which the head is dilated:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the shape of a bookbinder's tool in which books are bound, where two forceps connect on both ends of two feet.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	May this virtue be that of the most subtle straitener, and it shall be made either from ivory or wooden rod.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And let the width of each wooden rod be two fingers wide and its margin on each side one finger in width; while its length is a palm and a half: and at the middle of these two rods are placed two joints made from this same wood already mentioned whose length is approximately half a palm plus a little more, with their widths being about two digits, or just over.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two joints are inserted into the mouth of the larger rod so that it can be opened with them when you revolve the two prescribed virtues.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another form, similar but lighter and more subtle:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Made from ivory or wood in the shape of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	At each end there are two additions of similar design with a length of approximately one palm and width being about two fingers.

De extraccio de la segondina.	De extraccio de la segondina translates to "For the extraction of the second one.
