De restauracio de fractura de la spalla.	Regarding the restoration of a shoulder fracture." 
Spatula tart es trencada en le loc lat de lu e no so trencatz de lu sino les marges.	Spatula tart is broken in its place within him and it is not completely broken but only at the edges.
E donc quan es trencat le loc de lu — e es trencat en le mieg loc de lu — e no es conogut sino per tocament, lahoras segon que es la figura de la fractura sforsa te la preparacio de lu e reduzir aquela segon la figura natural en tota manieyra de engen la qual es a tu possible.	And when the place of the fracture is broken - and it is broken in the middle part of him - and it is not known except by touch, then according to the shape of the fracture exert your preparation on him and reduce that according to its natural shape as much as you possibly can.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc polvera de moli am album de huou e stopa leon; e aprop pausa pulvil de drap duplicat; e aprop pausa sobre lu stela lada de taula subtil segon la quantitat de la spatula tota o mays un pauc.	Then place on the spot powdered moly with egg white and stopple it with lion fat; then place a doubled linen poultice; then place on him fine table starched cloth according to the quantity of the spatula wholly or slightly more.
Mays si dejos la stela es concavitat en alcu dels locs de la spatula, lahoras tu enguala aquela concavitat am stopa leon, e aprop pueja la stela segon equalitat.	But if you leave the cloth hollowed in any of the places of the spatula, then fill that hollow with lion fat, and then raise the cloth to level.
E aprop strenh desus am humemati longua ab constriccio decent e am fermesa de la stela entro que no sia remauguda del sieu loc.	Then strengthen it from above with long strips of cloth bound tightly and with the firmness of the cloth, so that it does not shift from its place.
E considera le liament en quascun dia; e totas veguadas que sia mollificat, lia autra veguada e stren le e equa la stela si es remauguda del sieu loc.	Consider the bandaging each day; and every time that it is softened, bind again and tighten it and equalize the cloth if it has shifted from its place.
E jagua le malaute sobre le sieu latz sa.	And place the sick person on his side.
E la spatula es restaurada en xx dias o en .xxv.	The spatula is replaced after twenty or twenty-five days.
E donc quan es complit aquest nombre, lahoras tu dissolveys le liament, e que tu scias ensegurat quar aquela es dels osses dels quals la cominicio no es temuda ni lor dissolucio.	And when this number of days is complete, you can then dissolve the bandages, and be assured that there will not be any damage to the bones during removal.
E si procezeys del loc del os pessa e pongeys dejos la codena, lahoras tu scindeys sobre lu, e osta le, e fay segon que havem dit en la fractura de la furcula de sadacio de apostema caut si accideys aqui.	If you are dealing with the site of a broken bone and place a chain there, then you must cut it open, remove it, and proceed as we have said in the case of a fracture of the fork-bone when abscess occurs.

De restauracio de la fractura del pietz.	On the restoration of a broken foot.
Le pietz alcunas veguadas es romput en le mieg loc de lu e aquo tart endeve; mays las extremitatz de lu mot endeve que so ciccadas e comminuidas.	Sometimes the foot is broken in its middle part, and this usually happens as a result of falling from a height; but its extremes are often crushed and comminuted.
E dels accidentz de lu quan es trencat le mieg de lu es que declina a las partidas dedintz e accideys a lu gran dolor, e dificultat en lo hale, e tos, e fort leu e vomeys sanc; e es declarada en lu cavitat en le os trencat e no es occulta al sentiment.	And the consequences of this injury when the foot is broken in its middle part are that there is severe pain on movement and breathing, coughing, great difficulty eating, and vomiting blood; and it is apparent to the touch that the cavity contains a fractured bone.
E la restauracio de lu es que sia resupinat le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa entre las spallas de lu un coyssi; e aprop prem als muscles de lu, e ajusta las costas de lu am las mas de dos costatz, e subtilia te en la operacio de lu e en la equacio segon tota manieyra que es ad aquo possibla e que conveneys ad aquo, entro que retorne la figura del os segon que cove. E aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e estopa e pausa desobre astela de taula subtil de sauze o de caligi e de a lor semblantz en levitat, pus que tu envolopas aquela en drap; e aprop subtilia te en lian aquela sobre le os trencat que no sia maugut; e vay am liadura segon retonditat al dors alcunas veguadas, e strenh aquel am strictura decent; e aprop considera la liadura en tota hora, e quan es mollificada strenh aquela. De restauracio de las costas quan son trincadas.	De restauracio de las costas quan son trincadas." 
Sapias que fractura de las costas no catz sino en locs grosses que siegon le dos; e de las extremitatz de lor de la partida denant no accideys ad aquelas contricio sino per aquo quar so cartillaginosas.	Here is the translation of your provided text:
E cognicio de lu no es amaguada al sentiment deves la inquisicio de lu am les ditz.	And make sure that your perception of him is not obscured by feeling sorry for him during the examination.
E la restauracio sia ayssi que enguales la fractura am les ditz segon la manieyra possibla, entro que sia engulhat segon que cove, e aprop emplastre e strenh le os trencat am stela, si indigeys de aquel.	The restoration should be such that it aligns the fracture with the words spoken (prescribed treatment), and it should be fastened according to what is necessary. Then apply a plaster cast and support the broken bone with a splint if required.
E si la fractura de las costas es declinant a las partidas dedintz, lahoras accideys al malaute dolor vehement e punctura, ayssi cum punctura que accideys ad aquel que ha pleureci, e per aquo quar le os ponh le velament; e accideys a lu difficultat de hanelit, e tos, e vomit de mot sanc; e aquesta es de dificil curacio.	And if the fracture of the ribs extends towards the chest cavity, it causes intense pain and stabbing sensations to the patient, much like what happens when pleurisy is present. This leads to covering the bone with cloth due to its location; furthermore, they will experience difficulty breathing, coughing, and vomiting blood - making this injury particularly challenging to heal.
E ja les Antixs so engeniatz en aquela am motz engientz.	And the Ancients have devised many devices for that with great ingenuity.
E de lor so que diso: cove que pauses viandas del malaute que engendro imflacio e ventositat, per que le ventre sia imflat e sia extendut, e la fractura sia impellida a las partidas defora.	It is said of them (the Ancients) that one should refrain from feeding the patient food that produces inflation and flatulence; for it causes the belly to inflate and stretch out, pushing the fracture towards the outer edges.
Mays nos avoreyssem aquo per so que no sia causa leugiera a generar apostema caut, si no accideys; e si ja accideys, lahoras ja ajuda ad aquo.	We would have preferred this (approach of avoiding certain foods) to prevent it from being a light cause of superficial abscesses, if they had not already occurred. But now that they have happened, it does help with the matter.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia pausada desus ventoza e aprop que sucque am fortitut; e es semblant a ratiocinacio, mays empero es temut que la ventoza atire las superfluitatz al loc per la debilitat.	And some of them said that it should be placed on a ventouse and then sucked strongly; this seems reasonable, but it is feared that the ventouse will draw the superfluities to the place because of weakness.
E diyssero alcus de lor: cove que·l loc sia cubert am lana que ja es submersa en oli caut, e sian pausatz pulvils entre las costas entro que sia umplida, que sia la liadura engual quan envolopas aquela segon retonditat; e aprop sia curat le malaute am curacio de pleuresi de vianda e de medicina.	And some of them said: the place must be covered with wool that has been soaked in warm oil, and powders should be placed between the ribs before it is filled [with air], the bandage should be applied like you would wrap something round and round; then the patient should be treated for pleurisy with food and medicine.
E si causa vehement constrenh le malaute la qual no sufferta, e le os punh le velament am punctura ledent, temem sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que fendam sobre le loc, descubram de la costa trencada, e aprop pausem desobre aquela instrument que conserve le ciphac, la rememoracio del qual es precedida, e que inscidam le os am facilitat, e extraguam aquel.	And if a violent stitch seizes the patient who is not suffering, and the bone pierces the membrane with a puncture wound, we fear for the patient; then it is necessary to make an incision over that place, uncovering the broken rib, and then place upon it an instrument that retains the splinter, the memory of which has been recalled [from previous experience], and that we may easily cut into the bone, and extract it.
E aprop que ajustem las doas labias de la plagua, si es gran, am cozidura, e curem aquela am emplastres entro que sia sanada.	Then we should join the two lips of the wound, if it is large, with sutures, and treat it with poultices until it is healed.
E si accideys dedintz apostema, lahoras tu coyta e enfon pulvils en oli rozat e pausa sobre le loc, e que sia curat le malaute am aquo que cove a la apostema dedintz.	And if an abscess occurs internally, you should apply this: soak powders in rose oil and place them on the area, and treat the patient with what is appropriate for an internal abscess.
E sia ressupinat sobre le latz sobre le qual dorm, entro que sia sanat.	And turn him onto his side, the one he usually sleeps on, until he is healed.
Capitol .ix.	Chapter 9.
De restauracio de fractura del spondil del dos e del col.	On the restoration of fractured spinal bones and neck.
Alcunas veguadas endeve fractura als osses del col, e tart endeve a lor atricio, e semblantment als spondils del dos.	Some injuries involve fractures to the bones of the neck, along with damage to their tendons and ligaments, similar to those affecting the spinal bones.
E cum aquo accideys ad alcu e voles saber si sara sanat o no, lahoras considera, quar si vezes las sieuas mas ja mollificadas e stupefaytas e mortas e no pot maure aquelas ni extendre ni strenher aquelas e quan constrenges aquelas am les tieus ditz o punges aquelas am agulha e no sent en aquelas dolor, lahoras sapias que no es sanat, e en las mes de disposicios es mortal.	And when such an accident happens to someone and you want to know if they will recover or not, consider this: if their hands have become softened, stiffened, numb, and unable to move any further or apply strength; and when you touch them with your fingers or prick them with a needle without causing them pain, then you should know that they are not healed, and in such cases it is often fatal.
E si mau aquelas e sent en aquelas constriccio am les ditz e punctura, lahoras sapias que la nucha de l’os es salva e que le malaute guereys am curacio.	And if they feel the pressure of your fingers and the pricking of the needle, then you know that the bone in their neck is still alive and they are on a path to recovery.
E si ve als spondils del col le semblant ad aquo e voles saber si sira sanat o no, lahoras considera als pes de lu.	And if you see similar symptoms in the spinal bones of the neck and want to know their prognosis, then pay attention to their feet.
Lahoras si tu vezes que so ja mollificatz, accideys ad aquels aquo que es accidit en las mas, e aprop quan jatz sobre le sieu dos, yeys ventozitat e egestio ses la sua volontat, e alcunas veguadas es resupinat sobre le sieu dos e vol urinar e no pot, lahoras sapias que es mortal, e adonc no trebales en la curacio de lu.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
Mays si no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, la causa es milhor e pus leugiera.	But if none of those causes occur, then this cause is better and more gentle.
E la curacio de lu es que te perforses a la sedacio del apostema caut que pauses sobre le spondil atrissat oli rozat sol, o am mugols de huous asatz; pausa sobre aquela aquel alcunas veguadas le dia entro que sia sedat le apostema caut.	The treatment for it is that you should make an incision at the site of the abscess, apply some warm oil or soft wool poultices on top; place over it a few dressings each day until the abscess is drained.
E lahoras pausa un dels emplastres confortantz e exsitans, e strenh sobre aquel am liament; e comanda al malaute que use de repaus e de tranquillitat e que no dorme sobre la partida am la qual atroba dolor entro que sia sanat.	Then apply one of the strengthening and invigorating poultices, and bind it gently; instruct the patient to rest and remain calm, and not to sleep on the painful side until they are healed.
E si accideys deves la atricio del os satagias o alcuna causa que ja es seperada de lu, lahoras cove que secces sobre la codena e que ostes aquel os; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua, am sutura si es gran; e aprop cura aquela am alcu encarnatiu dels enguentz, entro que sia sanat.	And if the disease spreads to the bones or any other separated cause arises, then it is necessary to cut out that bone and remove it; then join the two edges of the wound with stitches if it is large; and treat it with ointment from animal fat until it heals.
Mays si es trencat le derier del os alhoses, e es la fi de la coeta, lahoras cove que tu entrometas le dit pous de la ma senestra en le cul, e que enguales le os trencat am l’autra ma segon que es possible per equacio segonda; e aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e astelha, si indigeysses de aquels, e aprop strenh aquel.	But if the posterior part of the femur is broken and it is at the end of the shaft, then you must insert your left index finger into the anus, and with the other hand try to reduce the fractured bone as well as possible by manual traction; then apply a poultice and splint, if needed, and bind it tightly.
E si sentes satagias trencadas en lu, lahoras tu fen sobre aquela, e osta aquel, e cura la plagua am la curacio que es precedida entro que sia sanada.	And if you feel his thighs are broken, then act upon it and remove that part, and cure the wound with a treatment until it is healed.

De restauracio de la ancha.	Regarding the restoration of the anus. 
Les osses de las anchas tart so trencats, e si trencan, lahoras la fractura de lor no es sino communicio en las extremitatz de aquelas e son inscidas en la longitut e declinan a las partidas dedintz; e accideys al malaute dolor en le loc e punctura, e la camba es stupefacta quan es fractura.	Here is my attempt at translating the provided text: 
E la restauracio de lu es que tu extendas la tua ma sobre aquel entro que sia sobre la fractura qual es la figura de lu.	And for the restoration of the patient, you should extend your hand over the area where there is a fracture; it must be in such a way that it forms a figure with their body.
E si fractura es en la extremitat de lu tant solament, lahoras tu enguala aquela segon que a tu es apparelhat per equacio engual entro que sia asemblat a la sua figura natural.	If the fracture is only located at one end of their body, you must bandage that area according to what seems appropriate for equal distribution on either side of the injury, ensuring it is aligned with their natural posture.
Mays si la fractura es en le lonc o que ja declina a las partidas dejos, lahoras tu fay jaser le malaute sobre le sieu ventre entro que sia preparada a tu la restauracio de aquela fractura.	However, if the fracture is along their backbone or near the lower parts of the body, you must make the patient lie on their stomach while preparing for the restoration and treatment of that fracture.
E donc quan auras engualada aquela, pausa sobre lu emplastre, e aprop pausa sobre aquel astela de fust o de codena, e strenh per strictura sobre la qual no temas punctacio de fractura ni remocio de la stelha.	And so, once you have bandaged the area, place a plaster cast over it; then put an iron or wooden splint on top and secure it tightly without fear of puncturing the fracture or dislodging the bones.
E enguala la concavitat am aquo que uempla aquela entro que aquela prengua la strictura segon equalitat, e comanda al malaute que dorma sobre le sieu dos o desobre le sieu costat sa.	Bandage the cavity with something that fills it completely so that it provides equal support; command the patient to sleep on their back or side accordingly.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu cessa de extencio de lu e de la sua restauracio entro que sia sedat le apostema caut, e pausa sobre lu aquo que sede aquel segon que es precedit; e aprop retorna a la restauracio de lu, e strenh aquel ayssi cum cove.	But if an abscess occurs during treatment, you must cease the patient's extension and restoration until the abscess is sedated. Place on them whatever is required to treat it; then return to their restoration, securing that area as necessary.
E si accideysso en le os satagias o son comminuidas, lahoras tu las tratz.	And if it happens that the bones are shattered or broken, then you must treat them.
Capitol .xi.	Here is my translation of the title: 
De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.	De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.
Adjutori es aquo que es entre le coyde entro al cap de la spalla.	Adjutori is what lies between the elbow and the head of the shoulder.
E si es trencat, lahoras la restauracio de lu es en una de doas manieyras, de las quals es la una que tu prenguas fust pla de migiera groceza segon aquesta forma:	And if it is broken, its restoration can be done in one of two ways. One way involves taking a piece of wood plank of medium thickness and shaping it like this:
E sian liatz en doas extremitatz dos liamentz, e aprop sia suspendut del loc elevat.	And if it has two ends tied together with ligaments, then it is suspended from a raised location.
E segua le malaute sobre una sezela; e aprop gieta fora le sieu bras trencat sobre le fust entro que pervengua al titillic de lu en le mieg loc del qual sia annexa la curvitat del fust.	Then let the patient sit on a chair, and have them extend their broken arm onto the wooden plank so that its little finger reaches the middle point of the plank where there is an attached curve.
E aprop suspen sobre aquel alcuna causa greu, o·l minestre extenda aquel a las partidas dejos; e aprop le metge eque la fractura am las sieuas mas ensemps, entro que la fractura retorne segon que cove.	Then suspend something heavy over that, or let the assistant lift it from below; and then have the doctor place his hands around the fracture to align it properly so that the break heals as intended.
E l’autra manieyra es que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sieua cervitz e suspen la ma del col de lu am liament; e aprop comanda a dos ministres que la un de lor tengua aquo que es desobre la fractura am las suas mas; e l’autre tengua le pus dejos de lu; e quascu de lor extenda a la sua partida.	The other method is to have the patient lie face down on their neck, and suspend their hand from their neck with a ligament. Then instruct two assistants to position themselves accordingly: one above the fracture with his hands placed over it; while the other assistant stands below, supporting them at the legs or feet by extending outwards.
E si voles que la extencio sia pus fort, lahoras tu strenh sobre la fractura am liament e sobre aquela am autre liament, e quascu dels dos ministres extendan a doas suas partidas.	If you want the extension to be stronger, then press on the fracture with one ligament and on the other side with another ligament; while each of the two servants pulls on their respective ends.
E donc si la fractura es propinquada a la extremitat del muscle, lahoras cove que sia pausat la mitat del liament sobre le citillic e l’autre dejos la fractura deves le coyde.	And if the fracture is close to the end of the muscle, then you should place half of the ligament over the wrist and the other part underneath the fracture near the elbow.
E semblantment si la fractura es propdana al coyde, lahoras cove que sia pausat le liament sobre aquel loc e sobre aquel coyde.	Similarly, if the fracture is close to the elbow, you should place the ligament over that area and also support it with another piece of ligament on the elbow joint.
Enguala aquela am facilitat e ses trebal, e aprop quant sira engualada segon que cove e es applicada per bona applicacio, lahoras strenh aquela si no accideys apostema caut.	Secure that with ease and without effort, then once it is secured as required and properly applied, press on the fracture to avoid the onset of an acute abscess.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras layssa la strictura entro al vii dia, e pausa sobre lu lana sutza enbeguda en vi agre e oli rozat entro que repause le apostema, e lahoras tu stren aquela.	However, if an acute abscess occurs, leave the bandage in place for seven days; then apply a poultice of white wool soaked in vinegar and rose oil over the abscess until it softens, after which you can press on the fracture.
E la manieyra de strenher aquela es que pauses emplastre sobre la fractura, e aprop pausa envolopament de drap nau sobre le emplastre; e aprop ajuste le bras sobre aquel adjutori, e pause la sua ma uberta sobre le sieu muscle.	The method of pressing on the fracture is as follows: place a plaster cast over the fracture and then wrap a bandage made of new cloth around it; adjust the arm so that it rests on this support and leave the hand open, resting on top of the plaster.
E pausa le drap e strenh sobre le adjutori le bras per so que·l bras sia en loc de stelhas, si no prohibeys de aquo alcuna causa del os trencat.	Underneath place a cloth and bandage firmly on the supporting arm, so that the arm is in its usual position; do not prohibit this if there are any causes preventing fracture of the bone.
E lahoras usa de stelhas.	Then use splints for support.
E es que pauses sobre la fractura aquela stela que sia pus lada e pus fort de las autras stelas; e pausa entre quascuna stela la latitut del dit, e sia la longitut de las stelas segon la trencadura am addicio de tres ditz de tota partida.	And make sure you place over the fracture that splint which is thicker and stronger than others; leave between each of them a finger's width space, and make their length according to the breakage by adding three fingers' thickness to it.
E aprop strenh sobre las stelas am la strictura la qual he dita al comensament del capitol.	Then firmly bind the splints together with the tight bandage I mentioned at the beginning of this chapter.
E es que la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura sia pus streyt.	And make sure that your binding over the fracture site is very tight.
E quant pus es alonguada la fractura sia la strictura menor.	And if the break is more elongated, then let the bandage be looser.
E donc si vezes le situament de las stelas e la strictura ayssi cum havem dit en la hora en la qual restauras le membre al sieu assituament, lahoras tu fay.	And thus if you observe the arrangement of splints and binding as we have described above at the hour when you restore the limb to its place, then do so.
E si temes apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la strictura e las stelas entro al dia vii ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you fear suppurative inflammation, then leave the bandage and splints in place for seven days as we have said above.

E sia la sua dormicio del malaute sobre le sieu dos, e las sieuas mas sian sobre le stomac.	And let the patient's sleep be on their back, with their hands resting on their stomach.
E pausa sobre le adjutori cocena plena de lana engualment, e considera en tota hora de la nueyt o del dia que no sia deliada ni dissolta la figura del membre trencat, o que sia le liament mollificat, donc rectifica aquo tot am la tua vertut.	Place a clean woolen pad on the helper, and ensure that throughout the night or day, the bandage remains tight and does not loosen or shift from its position over the broken limb; therefore, you must rectify any such situation with all your skill.
E pausa la vianda del malaute segon le orde le qual havem denant mes, enayssi que la vianda sia subtil en le comensament entro que es comensat strenher; e lahoras cove que egrossas la vianda de lu. Quar de constuma del adjutori e de la camba de lu es que sian strengutz en xl dias; e lahoras cove que sian desliatz e sia administrat banh e sia medicat am enguentz los quals rectifican aquel. Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils; dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejos le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus. E fort leu es trencat le focil major solament, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemps.	And it is rare that only the larger bone breaks or just the smaller one, and often they both break together.
E quan es trencat le focil petit desus, lahoras la restauracio de lu es leugiera, e la sanacio de lu es pus leugiera.	And when the smaller bone breaks above [the wrist], then its restoration is light, and its healing is lighter.
E quan es trencat le focil de lu dejos la fractura de lu es mala, e la sanacio de lu es dificil.	And when the larger bone breaks below [the wrist], then its fracture is severe, and its healing is difficult.

De restauracio de la fractura de la camba.	On the restoration of the fracture in the leg." 
Sapias que en la camba so dos osses dels quals la un es gros, e es le nompnat per nom de la camba; e l’autra es subtil, e es nompnat focil.	Sure! Here is the translation of the provided text:
E accideys a quascus de las specias de fractura aquo que accideys als dos osses del bras, e per aquo es fayta restauracio de lu ayssi cum restauracio del bras engualment, e la operacio de lu es una.	And it happens to some of the types of fractures that affect both bones of the arm; for this reason, its restoration is done just like the restoration of the arm itself, and its operation is one and the same.
E si so trincatz dos osses ensemps, la camba es convertida a totas partidas.	And if both bones are dislocated together, the arm is completely disabled.
E si es trinquat le os pus subtil, la camba es convertida a las partidas Denant.	And if the finer bone becomes dislocated, the arm is rendered useless in front.
E si es trincat le os pus gros, atrobas aquel dejos, e es de aquelas causas que no so a tu ameguadas.	And if the thicker bone becomes dislocated, you must put it back in place, and this is one of those cases that cannot be treated at home.
E aprop aministra extencio e equacio e liguacio de las astelas segon aquel engualment.	Then administer extension, approximation, and reduction of the bones accordingly.
Mays empero cove, si la fractura de la camba es laja havent motas satagias, que la extencio sia mendre e pus leugiera, e alleuja am la tua vertut.	But be aware that if the arm fracture has many jagged edges, make the extension less rigorous and gentler; ease off with your strength.
E en la camba es alcuna causa de operacio sobre le bras, e es quan tu engualas las stelhas e que comples tota la tieua operacio, lahoras tu prendras pessas de fustz de pi le qual es pausat dejos las cauzas las quals so pausades en solies, e so faytas eyssament de brancas de palma; aligeys de aquelas a las quals es petita groceza, e no sia ges de las manudas, e sia la longuesa de aquelas segon la longuesa de la camba, e del denol entro al pus dejos.	And if there is any reason to operate on the arm and you see that both bones are involved in the whole procedure, then take pieces of pinewood which will be placed beneath the affected area; make them out of palm branches; tie those together with cordage made from either very small-diameter fibers or not so coarse rope and let it be such a length as corresponds to the one of the arm, from the top down to its lowest point.
E aprop envolopa sobre quascuna drap en doas envolucios segon la longitut de lu, e pausa la una sobre la partida de la camba de la una part e l’autra del autra part, e sian del denol entro al pus bas loc del pe.	E aprop envolopa sobre quascuna drap en doas envolucios segon la longitut de lu, e pausa la una sobre la partida de la camba de la una part e l’autra del autra part, e sian del denol entro al pus bas loc del pe.
E aprop lias las doas stelhas en tres locs de doas extremitatz e al mieg loc, quar am aquesta strectura la camba es prohibida de clinar a la partida dextra e sinistra, e sta per bona stacio.	Here is my translation of the sentence: 
E ja es aministrat un brasset de fust segon la longuesa de la camba; e sia pausada en lu la camba per so que conserve aquel de movement.	And a wooden board has been administered according to the length of their leg; it should be placed under their leg to prevent any movement.
E majorment cove que tu fassas aquo en fractura, e quan am aquela es plagua propriament.	However, be aware that you should do this in the case of fractures; it is commonly referred to as plastering.

De la fractura del talo e dels osses del pe e dels ditz.	On fractures of the heel bone and the bones of the foot, called 'ditz'.
Al talo no accideys fractura de tot; mays als osses del pe accideys fractura alcunas veguadas; e als ditz del pe pauc accideys fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio en las mes de disposicio.	The heel bone rarely experiences complete fractures but the foot bones may suffer from partial fractures on occasion; and the 'ditz' of the foot rarely fracture, they only undergo changes in their natural position.
E si als osses del pe endeve fractura e vezes aquels osses esser elevatz sobre si entre lor, lahoras le malaute pause le sieu pe sobre la terra preparat ayssi cum anant.	If the foot bones suffer a fracture where they lift up from each other, have the patient place their foot on prepared ground as they walk.
E aprop pausa la un pe sobre aquo que es elevat de aquels osses, e aprop calca aquels, e prem, e engualha aquels entro que torno en los locs.	And then place one foot on what is elevated above those bones, and press down, applying pressure, and push them back into their places.
E aprop pausa emplastre e stopa desus, e pausa dejos le ventre del pe una petita taula a la qual sian dos caps plas.	And then place a plaster and bandage over it, placing underneath the foot's belly a small table with two flat heads.
E aprop strenh aquela am le pe am strectura descent, pus que tu has envolopada aquela am draps e am autres causes de las quals indigeys.	And then reinforce it with the foot in a downward stretch position because you have wrapped it with bandages and other necessary materials.
E cum a lu passan tres dias o quatre, lahoras tu deslia le liament, quar tu atrobaras les osses engualatz, o sian trincatz o sian dislocatz, e la operacio en aquels es ayssi co coneysses.	And once three or four days have passed, you can then untie the bandages, for you will find the bones have been pushed back into place, either fastened or realigned, and the operation on them is thus completed.
Mays si alcus ditz son trincatz, lahoras restaura aquels, e enguala aquels ayssi cum yeu e recomtat a tu en la restauracio dels ditz de la ma.	But if some say they are still stuck or have not moved at all, then adjust and push those bones as I have described to you in the process of restoring the fingers of the hand.
E aprop pausa al dit trincat stela segon la longitut del dit, e sia pus lada de lu un pauc; e aprop dejos le pe aquesta taula la qual e a tu recomtada, e strenh aquela am strictura decent.	Then place the stuck finger with its tip extended according to the length of the finger and have it placed slightly off to one side; then place this foot on top of that table which was described to you before, keeping it in a downward stretch position.
Mays si aquo que es trincat dels osses so dos o tres o mays, lahoras tu pausa sobre quascun dit astela de la sua quantitat envolopada en drap leon, e strenh la taula en le pus bas del pe, e sia stant sobre la un dels caps de la taula foro le ventre del pe per que la tengua am bona retencio.	But if what is trapped in the bones is two or three or more, then you place on each finger a splint of its appropriate size wrapped in linen, bind the board to the bottom of the foot, and have it resting on one end of the board so that there may be good retention.
E es convenient a tu que no oblides que no consideres totas las causas las quals que e ditas a tu en las autras fracturas dels accidentz que havem dit; e opausa te a tot accident am aquo que cove.	And it is important for you to remember not to overlook any of the causes that I have mentioned to you regarding other fractures and accidents we've discussed previously; apply yourself accordingly to each case.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter XVIII.
De fractura del conh de la femna e del os del pentenilh e de la vergua del home.	On the fracture of the woman's hip, the man's penis bone, and the male genitalia.
Quan le conh de la femna es trincat, lahoras fay aquela ceser en cezela cayrada, e aprop enclina aquela a la partida del dos un petit, e sia tenguda detras.	When a woman's hip is fractured, make an incision in the crease of her buttock and then slightly incline that side towards you; have it held back.
E aprop la matrona umpla le conh de coto, e sia fayt en le conh de lu ayssi cum spera; e aprop la femna sia concutida, e eleva le dos de lu petit a petit, quar tot aquo es fora-getat entro que sia denant la partida del conh ayssi cum spera e l’os trincat retorna.	Then the midwife should fill the hip with cotton, and it should be done in her hip as we hope; then the woman should be shaken, and her back should be raised little by little, for all of this is forgotten until the hip is before you as we hope, and the fractured bone returns to its place.
E aprop pausa pulvils sobre le dos de lu, e quan vol urinar remaugua le coto am facilitat e aprop urine, e reduzeys e retorna aquel segon la manieyra segon la qual mezist aquel al comensament, e aprop retorne al sieu pulvil primier.	Then place powders on their back, and when they want to urinate, provide a cup to catch the urine with ease. Afterwards, let them urinate, and return everything as it was at the beginning, then replace the first powder.
E fassa ayssi per vii dias o enviro aquels, quar aquel es restaurat.	Do this for about seven days consecutively until he is fully restored.
E si voles, pren una vezica de ovela e strenh sobre le trauc de lu una canula de canavera; e entromet tota la vesica en le conh de lu, e aprop ensuffla en la canula am vertut entro que la vesica sia imflada dedintz le conh, quar la fractura retorna.	And if you wish, take a sheep's bladder and strengthen it over their wound with a hollow cane; then insert the entire bladder into their rectum, and blow air through the cane vigorously until the bladder is fully inflated inside the rectum, for this will cause the fracture to heal.
E aprop sia umplida de coto e estia per alcus dias segon que havem recomtat, entro que sia sanat.	Then fill it with urine and let it remain there for some days as we have mentioned before, until he is healed.
E quan le os del pentenil de home o de femna es trincat, lahoras aministra en la restauracio e agulacio de lu aquo que havem recomtat en l’os del anca.	And when the bone of a man's or woman's arm is broken, treat its restoration and healing with what we have mentioned for the hip bone.
E aquo que es dreyt no es occultat en aquestas fracturas proprinquas e que pauc endeveno, majorment ad aquel al qual es alcun studi e us e enten aquest meu libre mot; quar aquela fractura significa a tu en las majors disposicios via dreyturiera en la restauracio e en la strictura de lu, e donc enten be.	And this, which is straightforward and not hidden in these nearby fractures that rarely occur, is most evident to him who has some knowledge and use of my book; for such a fracture signifies to you the main procedure through the proper way of restoration and healing, and thus understand it well.
Mays en la vergua del home quan es trincada, pren guarguamela de auca, e met la vergua en aquela; e aprop pausa sobre lu envolucio de drap, e sia envolopada, e aprop sia layssada per tres dias o enviro aquels, e sia sanada.	Here is the translation of your provided text: 
Capitol .xix.	Here is my translation of your provided text: 
De restauracio de fractura dels osses quan es am plagua.	When restoring fractures of the bones when they are inflamed.
Convenient es ad aquel al qual accideys fractura am plagua, e majorment si le os es gran ayssi cum es le os de la cuoyssa o de l’adjutori, o semblant ad aquel, que tu te cuoytes e fleubotomes aquel tantost si las condicios de fleubotomia a tu o testifican ayssi cum desus havem dit.	It is beneficial for the person who has suffered an inflamed fracture, especially if the bone is large like the thighbone or arm bone, or similar to those, that you treat them and perform phlebotomy immediately, provided that the conditions for phlebotomy are favorable as mentioned earlier.
E si la plagua eflueys sanc, lahoras cove que tu te coytes a la retencio de lu enayssi que tu polverizes sobre lu zegi trissat, si a tu autra causa no es present.	And if the inflammation discharges blood, then you should cauterize it to prevent its retention in such a way that you can powder it with grated eggshells, unless another cause is not present.
E aprop comensa restaurar la fractura en aquel meteys dia, e no prolongues aquo, si no accideys apostema.	Then start restoring the fracture on that day by applying medication, and do not delay it, unless an abscess occurs.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la restauracio de lu entro al ix dia, entro que sia cedat le apostema, e no apropinques a lu en le tertz dia e·l iiii de tot, quar tu faras accidir mals accidentz.	But if an abscess does occur, then you should leave the restoration of the affected part alone for up to 6 days, until the abscess subsides, and do not approach it on the third or fourth day at all, because you will cause harm.
Mays si le os trencat es eminent sobre la codena descubert, lahoras cove que te perforses reduzir aquel e engualar aquel am las tuas mas am facilitat e am pauca extencio.	But if the broken bone is protruding from the open wound, then you should carefully push it back into place and align it with your hands to facilitate a less extensive procedure.
Mays si extencio no es a tu preparada e la equacio de lu am las tieuas mas, lahoras tu reduzeys aquel am las tuas mas am aquest sturment; e es sturment le qual es fayt de ferr, la longitut del qual es de vii ditz o de viii e la latitut del qual es segon la quantitat de la plagua; e per aquo es necessari al metge que prengua de aquels tres o quatre segon la quantitat que indigeys ad aquo en la curacio en tota specia de fractura.	Certainly, let's proceed with the translation: 
E sia redon, e sia en lu pauca groceza per so que no sia doblat deves la comprecio sobre aquel en la hora de la operacio.	And it should be rounded, and of such a small thickness that it does not bend; during the operation you must avoid applying pressure to that area.
E sia de aguda extremitat al qual sia marge en las sieuas extremitatz; e sia le desus de lu a grossetut tendent, e de la maytat de lu entro a las partidas.	And it should have pointed ends with margins at its tips; the top of it should be gently tapered, and divided into two parts.
E aquesta es la forma de lu:	This is how it looks like:
E es nompnat en grec “labre volentz atelarem”, so es paleta pauca.	And it is called "volentz labre atelarem" in Greek, which means small shovel.
Per que cove que sia pausada la extremitat de lu acuda elevada sobre la extremitat del os eminent.	Because it needs to be placed with its pointed end elevated above the prominent bone.
E inpelleys aquel en una veguada entro que retorne le os, e sia engualat am alcuna equacio.	Then drive it into the hollow behind the bone and make sure that it is well secured with a binding.
E donc esforsa te engualar las extremitatz de la fractura entre lor, e si la extremitat de lu trencada es subtil, e no pren aquela le sturment per bona axcepcio, lahoras cove que tu inscidas la extremitat de aquel os entro que l’insturment haja poder de aquo.	And make sure you secure the ends of the fracture between them; if the broken end is small and it does not fit properly with the instrument for a good reduction, then you must insert the end of that bone into the instrument so that it can achieve the necessary leverage.
Mays si no podes reduzir le os de tot am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras enscideys aquel am aquo que coveneys a lu dels inscizoris les quals havem ditz; o serra aquel am una de las serras en qualque manieyra sia a tu possible.	But if you cannot reduce the bone completely with what we have described, then cut it with one of the knives that we mentioned; or saw it with a saw in any way that is possible for you.
E aprop ratz aquel que roman en le os de asperitat e de scorsas menudas.	And then there was one who remained in the bone with roughness and tiny scratches.
E cum le os es reduzit, e aprop la reduccio le malaute atroba dolor vehement ledent, lahoras sapias que le os no es retornat al sieu loc natural; e adonc fay aquo quar tu confereyses al malaute gran juvament.	And when the bone is reduced, and as a result of this reduction, the patient experiences severe pain again, you will know that the bone has not returned to its natural position; therefore, do this, for it will greatly benefit the patient.
Cum es complida la tua restauracio la qual fas al os, e lahoras submergeys drap en vi stiptic negre, e propriament si es en estiu, e no pauses sobre la plagua cerot ni autre causa en la qual sia oli, per so que no fassa en lu accidir poyredura e corropcio.	Once you have completed the restoration of the bone, immerse a cloth in black styptic wine and apply it; especially if it is summer, do not place any ointment or oil on the wound, to prevent any accident of putrefaction and corruption.
E aprop aministra stelas en la hora del tieu compliment de la restauracio de l’os, e layssa la plagua descuberta enayssi que inscidas le trauc am forfexs e uses de envolucios segon la quantitat de la plagua.	Then provide stars (most likely referring to medications or treatments) at the time of completing the bone restoration, and leave the wound uncovered so that you can incise the swelling with scissors and use appropriate dressings based on the amount of discharge.
E guarda te am tota cautela que no strenhas la plagua am la fractura, quar motas veguadas an fayt aquo les fols metges, e fero accidir sobre les sieus malautes mort o malautia corrodent o zuthement, so es sania.	Take utmost caution not to tear the wound with the fracture, as ignorant doctors have done this in the past, leading to accidents where their patients either died or developed corrosive and debilitating illnesses; only health is preserved.
E si la tieua strictura leugiera, molli, diversa de la strictura de las autras fracturas.	And if your traction (referring to the process of realigning bones) is light, soft, and different from other fractures.
E si la plagua es gran o es plagua mala, e temes sobre aquel alcus accidentz mals les quals havem recomtatz, e atrobas dolor en le loc, lahoras no cove que pauses sobre aquel astelas, mays fay ad aquel envolucio de draps durs en loc de stelas e strenh lu am aquelas.	Under the given circumstances: a large plague or a severe one that causes concern due to potential negative consequences and pain in that area is observed. It should not be placed on top of regular beds, but rather wrapped tightly with tough linens instead.
E cum aprop un dia o dos vezes ja la plagua comensar, que en lu sia engendrat brac, lahoras tu osta desus le drap le qual havias pausat sobre aquel am vi, e aprop aministra calguas, enguentz am les quals de nostra constuma es que mediquem las plaguas, ayssi cum enguentz tetrafarmacon e semblantz ad aquel.	After a day or two when the plague begins to develop an arm-like appearance on the body, you must remove the linen covering that was previously placed over it and then apply hot compresses using fires made of four specific medicinal herbs as per our customary treatment for plagues.
E conveneys a tu que deslias le liament e considera la plagua en quascun dia mati e vespre entro que sia consolidada e fermada, e cove que·l membre sia preparat en tal manieyra que la poyredura corra de lu a las partidas dejos am facilitat.	It is advisable for you to regularly remove the bandage and examine the plague in both morning and evening until it has completely healed and stabilized. The affected limb must be positioned in such a way that drainage from it towards open areas below is facilitated.
si a la plagua passan motz dias, e no es consolidada ni es abscindit de lu le brac, lahoras sapias que aqui so satagias de las petitas per que cove enquieras la plagua am tenta.	If numerous days have passed and the plague still has not healed or detached from the arm, you should be aware that this is a sign of minor complications known as "little satagias" where immediate attention must be given to prevent further deterioration. 
E de aquelas satagias aquelas que so separadas remau e extratz, aquelas que de lor no so separadas e pongen le membre e fan accidir dolor, perforsa te a inscidir aquelas segon que a tu aquo es possibla.	Regarding these complications known as "satagias", the ones that are visibly separated and can be easily extracted should be removed accordingly. For those that cannot be physically detached and cause significant pain upon limb movement, you must attempt to surgically incise them whenever possible. 
E si accideys a la plagua zuchem o eluchen, so es stiomenios, o autra specia de corrupcio e de putrefaccio, lahoras cove que pauses a quada un de aquels am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio del qual es precedida narracio en le sieu capitol.	Under the circumstance that pus or other matter comes from the wound, whether it is abscesses or another form of corruption and putrefaction, then you should apply to each of those something appropriate for its cure as described in this chapter's previous narration.
E de aquo en le qual cove que stia lo mieu sermo e tu fassas present la tua pessa: quan os gros es trincat, emineys sobre le membre ayssi cum le os de la coyssa e del ajutori e semblantz ad aquels dels membres grans, e que no presumas atraccio de lu, ni la extraccio de lu quar motas veguadas accideys per aquo la mort; habantz layssa aquel entro que poyresca, quar fort leu cayra per si aprop xx dias o xxx; e lahoras cura la plagua si a tu es vist, e si no layssa aquela.	When the bone is severely fractured and protrudes from the limb like the hip bone or other large bones of similar size, and you should not attempt to draw it back as doing so may result in complications that lead to death; instead, let it remain until it can be safely handled, which could take about twenty or thirty days; then treat the wound if you are able, otherwise leave it alone.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter 20.
De la curacio de nodacio que accideys en le vestigi de alcuna fractura.	On the treatment of calluses that form on the foot due to any fracture.
Motas veguadas accideys aquesta nodacio en le vestigi de sanacio de fractura, e majorment que es prop de las juncturas, e es orrasada per lu la figura del membre; e fort leu prohibeys le membre de la sua operacio natural.	Complications from these calluses can occur due to the healing of a fracture, especially if they are near the joints and distort the shape of the limb; they may also restrict the limb's natural movement.
Adonc considera si la nodacio es recent e aministra en aquela medicinas que han stipticat ayssi co es aloen, e enses, e mira, e sercacollo, e acrassia, e semblantz ad aquels; enayssi que prenguas de aquela alcunas o totas, e comfesiys aquelas am vi stiptic, o am album de huou, o am vi agre, e pausa aquela sobre la nodacio en estopa, e constringeys aquelas sobre lu per bona constriccio.	If the callus is recent, consider using medications that have a styptic effect such as aloe, galbanum, myrrh, elemi, and similar substances; you can use one or all of these, mixed with vinegar or egg white, and apply them to the callus on a piece of cloth. Secure this in place with good compression.
E leyssa extrictura que no deslies aquela per motz dias; e aprop deslia aquela e itera autra, entro que sia remauguda la nodacio; o strenh sobre aquela lamina de plom descentment, quar plom ha proprietat de remaure tot aquo que es imflat en les membres. Mays si nodacio ja es en peyra convertida e streyta es e nessessitat provoca a ostar aquela coytadament, e lahoras scindeys aquela per la partida pus sobirana de lu, e inscideys la superfluitat e eminent, o ratz aquela am alcus rezoris entro que sia remauguda; e cura aquel entro que sia sanat. De restauracio de fractura quan es restaurada e aprop aquo roman le membre subtil e freul no segon la sieua natura.	When restoring a fracture, once it is restored and what remains of the member is delicate and fragile not according to its nature.
Quan fractura de os es restaurada, e aprop aquo roman le membre subtil e freul, lahoras aquo no es fayt sino per motas causas: de las quals la una es multitut de solucio del liament e de la liguacio de lu fayta no segon que cove; o per superfluitat de strictura dels liamentz entro que·l nutriment sia prohibit correr al membre; o per multitut de embrocaccio superflua; o per movement superfluent no en la sua hora; o per pauquesa de sanc en le cors del malaute e per debelitat de lu.	When a bone fracture is restored, and what remains of the member is delicate and fragile, it can only be done for several reasons: one being an abundance of liquid in the wound, causing it to not heal as it should; or due to an excess of stiffness in the ligaments prohibiting nourishment from reaching the member; or because of excessive external manipulation; or because of unnecessary movement at the wrong time; or because of a lack of blood in the patient's body and their overall weakness.
E curacio de aquo es dar a mengar al malaute e far le cor de lu tendre entro que·l sanc sia multiplicat en lu; e aministra banh; e entromet gaug e leticia sobre lu.	To cure this, the patient must eat and make their heart tender so that blood is multiplied within them; they must also take a bath; and surround them with joy and happiness.
E aprop pausa pegua sobre le membre, per so que la pegua atire a lu mot nutriment, o continua embrocacio de lu am aygua tebeza, entro que·l nutriment corr e retorne a la sua figura natural.	Then place wax on the member, so that the wax draws in much nourishment, or continue to manipulate it with thick water until nourishment flows and returns to its natural form.

De curacio dels osses trincatz quan so restauratz tortuozament e prohibeys la operacio de lor de aquo que cove.	On the treatment of broken bones when they are restored crookedly, and it is forbidden to operate on them as one should.
